document.use = "BE"

/*-------------------*/ 
/*-----spread[1]-----*/ 
/*-------------------*/ 

spread[1].minuse = 1
spread[1].position = 1

# page[1]
# ---------------------

page[1].order =["norm_gr", "text_producttitle", "text_typetitle"]
page[1].position = 1
page[1].minuse = 1
page[1].maxuse = 1
page[1].groups = ["norm_gr",[image_normimg, text_normtxt]]
page[1].stacks = [["norm", norm_gr],["fabric", text_fabric]]

text_producttitle.value = page.parent.title.value
text_typetitle.value = page.this.title.value
image_typeimage.value = page.child.field_extraimg1.value
image_typeimage.overflow = "crop"
image_normimg.value = page.this.field_p3p00normimage.value
text_normtxt.value = page.this.field_p3p00normname.value
text_fabric.value = page.child[all].field_p3p00fabricname.value

norm.marginy = -12.2
norm.maxuse = 4
fabric.marginy = 7.6
fabric.maxuse = 3
